mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT bue.* FROM member bu LEFT JOIN member_role bur ON bu.id = bur.user_id LEFT JOIN role br ON bur.role_id = br.id LEFT JOIN module_role bp ON bp.role_id = br.id LEFT JOIN module bue ON bue.id = bp.module_id WHERE bue.deleted_flag=0 and bue.menu_flag=1 and bur.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from module where deleted_flag=0 and system_id=#{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
